format: html
editor: visual

```{r, tidy=TRUE, results='hide', results='hold', warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(xgboost)
library(tidyverse)
library(visdat)
library(xgboost)
library(naivebayes)
library(gendercoder)
library(janitor)
library(gt)
```


```{r, tidy=TRUE, results='hide', results='hold', warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
train = read.csv("inter-uni-datathon-2024-nsw/test.csv")
test = read.csv("inter-uni-datathon-2024-nsw/train.csv")
```

```{r, tidy=TRUE, results='hide', results='hold', warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
vis_miss(train)
vis_miss(test)

train = train |> mutate(gender_clean = gendercoder::recode_gender(Gender))
train |> tabyl(gender_clean) |> arrange(desc(n)) |> gt() |>
  cols_hide(columns = vars(valid_percent)) |> cols_label(gender_clean = "Gender", n = 'Number', percent = 'Percent') |> fmt_percent(columns = percent, decimals = 2)

glimpse(train)
glimpse(test)

table(train$DeviceType)

ggplot(train) + aes(x=UserTenure) + geom_histogram()
```
